name: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA)
hydrogen peroxide (HP)
acetic acid (AA)
sulfuric acid (SA)
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA) (CAS Reg. No. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (HP) (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), acetic acid (AA) (CAS Reg. No. 64-19-7), and, optionally, sulfuric acid (SA) (CAS Reg. No. 7664-93-9).
